## What is a Geographic Information System (GIS)?

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}

-   "a computer-based system to aid in the collection, maintenance, storage, analysis, output, and distribution of spatial data and information."
-   "GIS is concerned with the absolute and relative location of features, as well as the properties and attributes of those features."
-   Decision support system
-   More than just the hardware and software
